locutie.beschrijving: The sermon contrasts the human-centered concept of 'spirituality' with the biblical 'Holy Spirit' as the active power of God. It uses Old Testament imagery (wind, breath, verbs) and Trinitarian theology to define the Spirit's work in history and personal life.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. The preacher focuses on the Hebrew 'ruach' and the grammatical function of verbs in Isaiah and the Psalms to establish a theological foundation.

illocutie.beschrijving: The preacher primarily asserts the nature of God's Spirit but shifts toward the end to promising and declaring comfort to the weary.
voorbeelden: God is a verb.
The Holy Spirit of God is your friend.
I close with the last words of King David.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: To shift the hearer's focus from their own religious performance (spirituality) to reliance on God's external power (Holy Spirit).
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Explicit. The sermon is entirely about the Spirit and concludes by asking the Spirit to make the words the 'Word of God'.

voorbeelden: The Spirit is a mover.
God is not waiting around.
Isaiah has a great deal to say.
Notice the key verb.
Forget your own spirituality.
Listen to these words of Paul.
I was thrilled a few weeks ago.
I am sorry to say.
I think it may have been the first time...
You will be saved by God.
The Holy Spirit is your friend.
He will do these things.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Strong toward the end; the preacher binds God's character to the hearer's specific suffering.

voorbeelden: May these inadequate words... be for you today the Word of God.
Amen.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Moderate. The preacher uses a 'may it be' optative rather than a direct 'I declare to you', though the final blessing carries sacramental weight.

indicatoren: Extensive historical and exegetical explanation of Hebrew verbs.
Lengthy discussion on John Calvin and Christopher Hitchens.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer is well-informed about the Spirit but remains an observer of the Spirit's work elsewhere for the first two-thirds of the sermon.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise earlier in the text
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter; the 'event' of the sermon is back-loaded.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: High quality, moving from general biblical truth to personal address ('reaching out for you').
voorbeelden: The Holy Spirit of God is your friend.
The Holy Spirit is the power of God to set you on your feet.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdotes and homiletical transparency ('I have been thinking').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the suffering/weary hearer in the final section.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: High. Used to apply the Spirit's power to the hearer's 'marriage on the rocks'.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Isaiah, Calvin, the Spirit's history, and geopolitics.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a lecture-like atmosphere in the middle section.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: The sermon moves from Assertive (What the Spirit is) to Commissive (What the Spirit does for you) to Directive (Rest in this).
voorbeelden: Assertive: 'The Spirit is a mover.' -> Commissive: 'The Holy Spirit is your friend.' -> Directive: 'Forget your own spirituality.'
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The transition is late but powerful.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Because the Spirit intercedes (Indicative), wait with patience (Imperative).

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a corrective to moralism, using the indicative of God's power to provide comfort to the exhausted.

sterke_punten.effect: Makes the abstract concept of the Spirit concrete and active.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The discussion on Calvin and Hitchens.
zwakke_punten.probleem: Intellectualizes the sermon, delaying the performative encounter.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It becomes an event in the final third when the preacher stops 'talking about' the Spirit and starts 'promising' the Spirit to the broken.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The preacher acts as a mandatory of the Word, specifically in the final blessing.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Yes, emphasized in the Davidic conclusion.
tekstueel_bewijs: May these words... be for you today the Word of God.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, the Spirit is the one who 'intercedes' and 'sets on feet'.
tekstueel_bewijs: The Spirit himself intercedes for us.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Implicitly treated as a means of grace that delivers what it speaks of.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Strongest in the Isaiah 44 and Romans 8 sections.
tekstueel_bewijs: He dawns on us like the morning light.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on 'is' and 'found' (Assertive). It needs more 'I promise' or 'God gives' (Commissive) earlier on.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The Spirit of God is the energy of God.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: This Spirit, this very energy of God, is being poured out upon you now.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a definition to a present-tense event.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried in the conclusion.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the personal promise into the exegetical sections.
voorbeeldzinnen: As the Spirit swept over the waters, He sweeps over your chaos today.

adressering_verbetering.probleem: Too much 'we' and 'they' in the middle.
adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Use 'you' more frequently to maintain the address.
voorbeeldzinnen: You do not need to develop spirituality; God gives you His Spirit.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A deeply theological and comforting sermon that successfully escapes the trap of 'spirituality' by anchoring faith in the performative power of God's Word.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: Unlike SvT, which would focus on the preacher's 'self-revelation' or 'appeal', SAT reveals this sermon as a 'Divine Act' where the preacher's inadequacy is irrelevant to the Spirit's force.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The power here is not in the cleverness of the 'Spirituality vs Spirit' contrast, but in the illocutionary force of the biblical promises cited.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT highlights that the sermon's 'event-character' is found in the shift from the 3rd person (Calvin/Isaiah) to the 2nd person (You/Your marriage).

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The Holy Spirit of God is your friend.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Indicative-heavy' preaching that succeeds because the Indicative is so dynamic (God as a verb).
